resources.string: Hardware buttons have to be blocked in the baby browing mode. We only look at the hardware button events when lock is enabled, other times we dont capture any personal data or button clicks.
\'Toddler Lock Screen\' app doesnt collect any of your personal data and uses the accessibility service just to
Permission to draw on other apps is needed to create overlay lock screen.

Accessibility permission needed to block all hardware keys in Lock mode. You can choose to have degraded functionality by not allowing this. Except recent hardware button, everything should work fine.
